name: sb-solver
description: - Check out the live app, [here](https://sb-solver.herokuapp.com/)! - _Spelling Bee Solver_  is a web app designed to provide teh solution to the New York Times' spelling bee game, [here](https://www.nytimes.com/puzzles/spelling-bee). # Tech Stack - React - React Hooks (useState, useContext, useEffect) - Merriam-Webster API # Credits - English words have been pulled from _dwyl's_ repository, [here](https://github.com/dwyl/english-words). - Grabbing definitions from Merriam-Webster's API, [here](https://dictionaryapi.com/)

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix frontend npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.start: npm run server npm run frontend
